005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.UriAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
014
015import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
016import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
017
018import java.net.URI;
019
020/**
021 * Assigns a Metapath namespace to a prefix for use in a Metapath expression in
022 * a lexical qualified name.
023 */
024@SuppressWarnings({
025    "PMD.DataClass",
026    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
027})
028@MetaschemaAssembly(
029    formalName = "Metapath Namespace Declaration",
030    description = "Assigns a Metapath namespace to a prefix for use in a Metapath expression in a lexical qualified name.",
031    name = "metapath-namespace",
032    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
033public class MetapathNamespace implements IBoundObject {
034  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
035
036  /**
037   * "The namespace URI to bind to the prefix."
038   */
039  @BoundFlag(
040      formalName = "Metapath Namespace URI",
041      description = "The namespace URI to bind to the prefix.",
042      name = "uri",
043      required = true,
044      typeAdapter = UriAdapter.class)
045  private URI _uri;
046
047  /**
048   * "The prefix that is bound to the namespace."
049   */
050  @BoundFlag(
051      formalName = "Metapath Namespace Prefix",
052      description = "The prefix that is bound to the namespace.",
053      name = "prefix",
054      required = true,
055      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
056  private String _prefix;
057
058  public MetapathNamespace() {
059    this(null);
060  }
061
062  public MetapathNamespace(IMetaschemaData data) {
063    this.__metaschemaData = data;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
068    return __metaschemaData;
069  }
070
071  public URI getUri() {
072    return _uri;
073  }
074
075  public void setUri(URI value) {
076    _uri = value;
077  }
078
079  public String getPrefix() {
080    return _prefix;
081  }
082
083  public void setPrefix(String value) {
084    _prefix = value;
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public String toString() {
089    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
090  }
091}
